Desde joven vivió en el campo, aprendió a sembrar y criar animales. Es por esa razón que cuando formó su familia, junto a su esposo decidieron convertir esta actividad en el sustento económico del hogar. En la actualidad siembran en terrenos propios diversos productos agrícolas como maíz, papa y demás hortalizas. Pero como la agricultura no deja ganancias diarias, también comenzó a criar animales como gallinas, ovejas, cerdos y vacas, las lleva a pastar de muy temprano. Ahora ella desea incrementar sus ganando, pues tiene mayor clientela a la que no quiere defraudar. Espera dentro de poco lograr su objetivo y mejorar su negocio.
Este es el noveno préstamo con MFP, por lo que agradece el apoyo otorgado, además promete ser puntual con el pago de sus cuotas, ya que aprendió a ser puntual y honrada.
Pensilvania, invertirá el dinero en la compra de gallinas y cerdos para aumentar su ganadería.
texts.en:
Pensilvania, 32 years old, is a very hard working woman.  She lives with her husband Marcial and her 2 daughters, Jimmy and Any, she takes care of them in the house that she bought 15 years ago.
She has lived in the country since she was young, where she learned to farm and raise animals.  For this reason when she had a family, they decided to turn these activities into what supported their home.  Currently they grow various crops, such as corn, potatoes, and others,  in their own fields.  Because farming does not provide a consistent daily income she has also started to raise animals such as chickens, sheep, pigs and cows.  She takes them to graze early in the morning.  She now wants to increase the amount of animals because she has more customers and does not want to disappoint them.  In a short time she expects to reach her goals and improve her business.
This is the ninth loan with MFP, and she is thankful for the support that she has received.  She promises to be timely with her repayments as she has learned to be punctual and honest.
Pensilvania will invest the money in the purchase of chickens and pigs to increase her stock.

loans.use: to purchase chickens and pigs.

loans.name: Jose Isaac

texts.es:
José, tiene 26 años de edad, vive con su madre y tres hermanos menores de edad, José se dedica al cultivo de granos básicos para obtener ingresos y ayudar a su familia con los gastos del hogar. Tiene cinco años de trabajar en lo propio, aprendió el trabajo con su familia, trabaja de lunes a sábado de 6:00am a 12:00pm.
El solicita un préstamo para el pago de una maquina desgranadora y pago de mano de obra para procesar la cosecha, este préstamo le ayudara para invertir en la preparacion de la producción de granos básicos.
El objetivo es mejorar su condición en la familia, tener lo necesario para que su economía prospere.
texts.en: Jose, 26, live with his mother and three siblings under the age of 18. Jose works growing basic grains to earn an income and help his family with household expenses. He has been working on his own for five years. He learned the trade with his family, and works from Monday to Saturday from 6 am until 12 pm. He is applying for a loan to pay for a grain threshing machine and workers to process the harvest. This loan will help him to invest in the preparation for the grain production. The goal is to improve his family's condition, and have enough so that the household economy prospers.

loans.use: to pay for a grain threshing machine and pay workers.

loans.name: Juan Santos

texts.es:
Juan,  por la temporada de fin de año se ha decidido por un nuevo préstamo, para invertir en el negocio que ha instalado, comprando boquitas, gaseosas, tomates, cebollas, detergentes, y más productos que son de utilidad para los clientes.

Con el préstamo anterior Juan logro realizar la siembra agricola, con la que obtiene los granos basicos para la alimentacion de su familia, ayudándole a su estabilidad económica, su familia está en mejor condición y en este tiempo ha comprado un vehículo el cual utiliza para su trabajo y familia.
texts.en:
Juan, by this year end season, has decided on a new loan to invest in his business. He will buy snacks, soft drinks, tomatoes, onions, detergents and more products that are used by his clients.

With his previous loan, Juan carried out the planting. With that, he gets the basics for feeding his family and helping their economic stability. His family is in better condition and at this time he has purchased a vehicle, which is used for his work and family.

loans.use: to purchase snacks, soft drinks, tomatoes, onions, and detergents.

loans.name: Mayra Miluska

texts.es:
Mayra es una joven de 19 años de edad, vive al lado de sus padres en la calurosa y acogedora ciudad de Nazca, la cual se caracteriza por tener un clima muy cálido y acogedor, asimismo de poseer muchos lugares turísticos, entre ellos las Lineas de Nazca. Mayra es una joven que lucha cada día por salir adelante; debido a su pocos recursos económicos solo pudo estudiar hasta el quinto grado de secundaria, pero le hubiera gustado estudiar la carrera de computación e informática.

Día a día Mayra trabaja como mesera en un pequeño negocio de venta de desayunos, ella labora alrededor de 8 horas al día y con el fruto de su trabajo apoya a sus padres con los gastos del hogar; ella cree que le va bien en su trabajo porque es muy responsable y sobre todo porque tiene muchas ganas de ser mejor cada día.

Mayra esta muy agradecida con los prestatarios Kiva ya que gracias a la ayuda que le han brindado ella podrá comprar mercadería para la temporada de verano como short, blusas, polos, entre  otros; de esta manera ella podrá tener un ingreso extra y seguir luchando para poder hacer realidad su mas grande sueño:" Estudiar una carrera universitaria"
texts.en:
Mayra,19,  lives next to her parents in the city of Nazca which is known for its warm and welcoming weather. It has many tourist areas, among them the Nazca Lines. Mayra is a young woman who struggles every day to get ahead. Due to poor economic resources she was only able to study until the fifth grade but she would have liked to major in computer science. 

Mayra works as a waitress in a small breakfast restaurant. She works about 8 hours a day. With her earnings she helps her parents with the household costs. She believes she does a good job because she is very responsible and she wishes to better herself every day. 

Mayra is very grateful for the Kiva lenders. Thanks to their help she can buy goods for the summer season such as shorts, blouses, polo shirts etc. This way she has extra income to help reach her biggest dream: " A university degree".

loans.use: buy merchandise (shorts, blouses, polo shirts etc.)

loans.name: Pablo

texts.en:
Pablo is a Mayan farmer from the village of San Jose, in Belize’s southernmost Toledo district. After two successive expansions, Pablo now farms around 1,000 cacao trees spread out over four acres of lowlands. His wife Victoriana and four live-in children are of major help at harvest time, as the family tends to work their own cacao instead of hiring outside help. Pablo’s family members are multilingual and speak both their native Maya Mopan as well as English.

Farming was something Pablo was born into and embraced out of the need to support his family. He is happy to be able to offer his children the option of a high school education, which in Belize is both optional and comes at a high cost. Two of Victoriana and Pablo’s children are currently in school, and one has opted to follow in Pablo’s footsteps and work the land for a living.  

Besides cacao, Pablo grows the traditional crops of beans, rice and corn, but is also experimenting with multi-cropping by planting fruit trees among his cacao and timber trees that provide the necessary shade and nutrients for both.  

As most of the family’s income comes from cacao, their wellbeing rests on continuous efforts to maintain and grow yields. Pablo is requesting this loan to set up an individual nursery of 500 seedlings that will be transplanted in six months’ time to expand his farm. In order to increase yields and shorten the period before the new trees become productive, Pablo will use grafting. So-called side-grafting means implanting a bud into the trunk of more mature seedling, a technique that requires utmost precision and on average results in around 75 percent success rate.

loans.use: To set up individual nursery for 500 grafted cacao seedlings and finish cleaning underbrush surrounding mature trees

loans.name: Maria Lilian

texts.es:
María, se dedica a la venta de papas fritas, yuca y antojitos, vive con su familia compuesta por su esposo quien es pensionado y tienen una hija de 19 años de edad, tambien una nieta de un año de edad, todos colaboran con los gastos de la casa, el negocio de María lo realiza todos los días  junto a una empleada, el horario es de 4:00pm a 9:00pm, desde hace tres años.
Ella solicita un préstamo para la compra de de insumos para la preparación de los alimentos por ejemplo, aceite, papas, yuca, elotes y un carrito para vender de forma ambulante, esto le ayudara al fortalecimiento y crecimiento del negocio, ya que en la temporada hay oportunidades de venta.
Su aspiración es apoyar con el negocio para que su hija continúe estudiando en la universidad, tambien quiere tener un  negocio más rentable.
texts.en:
María makes a living selling fried potatoes, yucca, and snacks.  She lives with her family: her husband, who's retired; their daughter, 19; and a granddaughter, 1.  They all contribute to the household expenses.  María and an employee have carried out her business every day for three years.

She's requesting a loan to buy supplies to make the dishes: oil, potatoes, yucca, corn, and a little cart to sell from as a street vendor.  This will help her strengthen and expand her business, because there are sales opportunities during this season.

Her goal is for her business to help her daughter continue studying in the university.  She also wants to have a more profitable business.

loans.use: to buy oil, potatoes, yucca, corn, and a little sales cart

loans.name: Jose Ramon

texts.es:
El señor José un humilde campesino es originario de la comarca llamada El Llano Grande, en las afueras de Boaco, casado  se dedica a la siembra de maíz, frijol y trigo desde hace 26 años actividad que realiza en tierras que le heredo su papa, además tiene sus vaquitas que ha ido comprando con los ingresos de la cosecha y dinero que ha ganado cuando viaja a cortar café al vecino país Costa Rica.  José  realiza su trabajo con ayuda de sus hijos y mano de obra de otras personas que contrata por la temporada.  la cosecha la lleva a vender a Boaco y Managua dependiendo donde paguen mejor el grano. 
 Hoy EL solicita este crédito ya que quiere  pagar mano de obra  y comprar alambres para darle  limpieza y mantenimiento al potrero para el siguiente ciclo de siembra.
texts.en:
Jose is a humble farmer from El Llano Grande, in the outskirts of Boaco, he is married.  He grows corn, beans and wheat, has done this activity for 26 years, he performs this activity in land that he inherited from his father, in addition he has cows that he has been buying with the profits from harvest and money that he has earned when he travels to harvest coffee in Costa Rica.  Jose performs his work with his children's help and seasonal labor that he hires.  He is going to sell harvest in Boaco and Managua, depending where they pay better for the grain.
Today he requests a loan to pay for labor and to buy some wires to clean and maintain the land for next crop season.

loans.use: to pay for labor and buy wires.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy iron, metal sheets, paint, electrodes, and other supplies.

loans.name: Maria Daysi

texts.es:
María, se decidió por un nuevo crédito, porque considera que ayudan para el negocio, ella comprara nuevamente productos para preparar antojitos como el pan y tamales, para eso es necesario tener aceite, manteca, condimentos, harina, huevos, levadura, entre otros productos que son muy importantes.
Con el préstamo anterior logro invertir en el negocio, con lo que pudo obtener mayor rentabilidad en el negocio, manifiesta que el crédito le ha ayudado mucho porque le ha ido bien, tiene el plan a futuro de comprar un molino de nixtamal, ya que  con los prestamos sus condiciones han mejorado.
texts.en:
María decided on a new loan because she believes that they help her business. She will again buy products to prepare snacks like bread and tamales. For this, she needs to have oil, lard, seasonings, flour, eggs, yeast, and other very important products. 

With the previous loan, she was able to invest in her business, which enabled her to achieve greater profitability. She claims that that loan has helped her greatly, as things have been going well. She has plans to buy a corn mill in the future, since her finances have improved with the loans.

loans.use: to purchase oil, lard, seasonings, flour, eggs, and yeast.

loans.name: Blanca Cecilia

texts.es:
Blanca, se ha decidido por surtir mas el negocio, solicita un préstamo para la compra de los materiales necesarios para seguir en la venta de meriendas, comprara plátanos, yuca, aceite, papel, bolsas, leña, condimentos, entre otros productos necesarios.
Esto ayudara a que Blanca continúe realizando el negocio. Considera que el trabajar con préstamo le ha mejorado el negocio, teniendo los insumos necesarios, se ha ubicado con la venta en una zona de oficina en la que sus ventas han mejorado, en su familia comenta que se mantienen con lo necesario.
texts.en:
Blanca has decided to stock her business more, she requests a loan to buy the necessary inputs to continue with her sales of food; she will buy bananas, yucca, oil, paper, bags, firewood and condiments, and, other products she needs.
This will help Blanca continue performing her business.  She thinks that working with a loan has benefited the business, having the necessary inputs, and locating herself in an office area where her sales have increased.  She mentions that her family maintains itself with what's necessary.

loans.use: to buy bananas, yucca, oil, paper, bags, firewood and condiments.

loans.name: Jorge Alberto

texts.es: Don Jorge tiene 61 años de edad, es casado vive en el municipio de Yoro junto a su esposa y un hijo. Don Jorge trabajo por varios años en una empresa gubernamental y luego quedo sin empleo. Hace 4 años que  empezó con sus propias actividades de negocio, compro un molino de moler maíz para hacer tortillas y prestar este servicio a la comunidad, también en su acera de su vivienda ha puesto una chiclera donde vende variedad de dulces, chicles, churros, cacahuates, sorpresitas, galletas y otros. Con el molino de moler maíz le ayuda  su esposa. a obtenido varios prestamos con ODEF el que solicita actualmente es el cuarto préstamo y es por 16,000 Lempiras con el cual va surtir su negocio con dulces, churros, galletas y otros, con el fin de aumentar las ventas y hacer crecer su negocio. Una de sus metas es establecer una bodega de productos comestibles.
texts.en:
Don Jorge is 61 years old, married, and lives in the town of Yoro with his wife and son. He worked at a governmental agency for several years, but later lost his job. Four years ago, Don Jorge started his own business activities. He purchased a grain mill for grinding corn used to make tortillas and provides this service to the community. Don Jorge also set up a candy stand near his house where he sells sweets, gum, snack foods, peanuts, candy dispensers, cookies, and other items. His wife manages the rental of the grain mill for grinding corn.

Don Jorge has obtained several loans from ODEF. He is currently requesting his fourth loan in the amount of 16,000 HNL. The money will be used to restock his business with candy, snack foods, cookies, and other items so that he can increase his sales and grow his business. One of his goals is to establish a convenience store where he can sell food products.

loans.use: to buy candy, snack foods, cookies, and other items.

loans.name: Carol Jeannette

texts.es:
Carol, vive con su esposo, tiene dos hijos de 6 y 8 años de edad, ella y su esposo trabajan para mantener el hogar, administra una ferretería, inicio este negocio como una forma de llevar el sustento a la familia, el horario es de 8:00am a 5:00pm, ella aprendió el comercio trabajando en otras ferreterías.
Solicita un préstamo para la compra de hierro, cemento, pintura, que los utilizara para ofrecer a los clientes, esto le ayudara para mejorar el inventario y mejorar las ventas.
Su aspiración con el negocio es que sea rentable y a través de él mejorar la calidad de vida para su familia.
texts.en:
Carol lives with her husband and has two children, ages 6 and 8. She and her husband work to maintain their home. 

Carol runs a hardware store; she started this business as a way of supporting her family. She works from 8:00 am to 5:00 pm. She learned the business working in other hardware stores. 

Carol is requesting a loan for the purchase of rebar, cement, and paint, which she will sell to her customers. This will help her to improve her inventory and improve her sales. 

Her aspiration for her business is for it to be profitable, thereby improving her family's quality of life.

loans.use: to purchase rebar, cement, and paint.

loans.name: Lino

texts.es:
Lino es de la comarca llamada La  Garita casado, tiene 10 hijos de los cuales 9 están casados  se dedica al ordeño de las vacas , también siembra maíz, frijol  el realiza esta actividad desde los 15 años actividad que aprendió de su  del papa quien era gran productor en aquella época y quien fue muy bueno con él y cuando falleció le dejo parte de la herencia de tierra y ganado y que hoy las ha multiplicado y para esto le ayudan sus hijos en el cuido de las vacas don lino la leche que ordeña de las vacas la vende aquí mismo en la comarca. 
Hoy don Lino solicita este crédito para comprar concentrado para el ganado y comprar una semilla de pasto para sembrar lo cual le será de mucha ayuda ya que viene el verano y ese periodo es seco y se necesita estar preparado para que los animales no sufran de esta manera puedan producir buena leche para vender. Uno de sus planes es poner un centro de venta de leche al por mayor.
texts.en:
Lino is from the region called La Garita.  He is married and he has 10 children of whom 9 are married.  He makes a living milking cows and also plants corn and beans.  He has performed this activity for 15 years.  He learned it from his father who was a great producer at that time and who was very good to him.  When he died he left him part of the inheritance of land and livestock which today has multiplied and for this his children help him in caring for the cows.  The milk that he gets from milking the cows Lino sells here in the same region.

Today Don Lino is requesting this loan to buy livestock feed and to buy grass seed to plant which will be of great help to him since the summer is coming and that period is dry and needs to be prepared for so that the animals don’t suffer.  In this way they can produce good milk to sell.  One of his plans is to set up a center for selling milk wholesale.

loans.use: to buy livestock feed and to buy grass seed.

loans.name: Cristobal Manuel

texts.es:
Cristóbal, 20 años de edad, originara de Managua, soltero, con conocimiento académico bachiller de quinto año, de oficio comerciante. Inicio desde muy joven trabajando con su papa, en la elaboración  de zapatos que con mucho empeño  ha  logrado desempeñar, este ha sido su primer negocio del cual ha podido salir adelante, el cuenta con el apoyo de su papa, sus expectativas es seguir ampliando su negocio para obtener mejores ganancias.
Cristóbal solicita el financiamiento para comprar todos los insumos que necesita como telas para zapatos, cuero, suela, pegamento y clavo para la elaboración de sus zapatos. Ya que ella estima que le ayudara a superar las ventas  comprando los materiales de trabajos que aun no tiene en su negocio,  para satisfacer  las  necesidades y brindar un buen servicio a sus clientes, sus planes futuros es establecer un negocio de diseños de zapatos para incrementar sus ingresos, su meta próxima  es mejorar la infraestructura del local para tener una buena presentación del negocio.
texts.en:
Cristóbal, 20, from Managua, is single with a high school degree and works as a merchant. 

When he was very young he started working with his dad, a cobbler. This has been his first business and he has been able to get ahead.

He depends on the support from his dad. He expects to keep expanding the business in order to improve profits. 

Cristóbal is asking for a loan in order to buy all the supplies he needs such as shoe fabric, leather, soles, adhesive and nails for making shoes. 

He believes buying material that he does not yet have in his business will improve his sales. This will satisfy the needs and provide good service to his customers. His future plans are to establish a shoe design business in order to increase his earnings. 

His near term goal is to aesthetically improve the infrastructure of the workshop.

loans.use: to buy all necessary supplies such as shoe fabric, leather, adhesive and nails.

loans.name: Marta Lorena

texts.es:
Marta, está solicitando un nuevo préstamo para comprarse mariscos frescos, ya que sus ventas están mejorando, se comprara pescado en varias clases, ya que así tendrá más posibilidades para seguir trabajando.

Con el préstamo anterior ella manifiesta que ha mejorado su condición en el negocio, esta comprando variedad de mariscos, para poder aprovechar la temporada, en la familia su condición ha mejorado, su deseo es tener local propio para seguir trabajando.
texts.en:
Marta is requesting a new loan so that she can buy fresh seafood. Her sales are improving, so she will buy different types of fish. This will also give her more opportunities to continue her work.

Marta says that her previous loan helped to improve the condition of her business. She bought a variety of seafood so that she could take advantage of the current season. Her family’s condition also improved. Her wish is to have her own shop where she can continue working.

loans.use: to buy different types of fish.

loans.name: Jose Iraldo

texts.es:
José , 53 años de edad , habitante de la comarca El Barranco , Teustepe municipio de Boaco, se dedica a la siembra de hortalizas y ganadería , actividad que realiza hace más de 20 años , es padre de 4 hijos su esposa es ama de casa . Su padre le dejo de herencia  una pequeña porción de tierra donde actualmente siembra hortalizas como chiltomas y pepinos, el resto de su familia se dedica a la siembra de granos básicos. Además de la siembra se dedica a criar ganado para vender, la mayor parte de sus siembras  la vende en su misma comunidad.
El necesita el financiamiento para comprar abono, fertilizantes y gasolina para la bomba de riego. Su próxima meta es sembrar ½ manzana de chiltomas, sandias y pepinos pues son productos muy buscados durante la época de verano.
texts.en:
José, 53, lives in the El Barranco, Teustepe region, in the town of Boaco.  He has made a living growing vegetables and in livestock for more than 20 years.  He's the father of four children.  His wife is a housewife.

His father left him a small plot of land where currently he grows vegetables such as chiltoma peppers and cucumbers.  The rest of his family makes their living growing basic grains.  In addition to the crops he also raises livestock to sell.  He sells the majority of his crops in his own community.

He needs the loan to buy manure, fertilizer, and gasoline for the irrigation bomb.

His next goal is to plant a half manzana of chiltoma peppers, watermelon, and cucumber because these products are in demand in the summer.

loans.use: to buy manure, fertilizer, and gasoline for the irrigation bomb

loans.name: Juan Bautista

texts.es:
Juan, se decidió por un nuevo préstamo para poder invertir en el negocio, se comprara pan especial para surtir mas en el negocio,  esto le ayudara a tener la suficiente cantidad para atender a los clientes en esta epoca de fin de año, donde aumenta la demanda. 

Con el crédito anterior ayudo a fortalecer más el negocio, ha incrementado la clientela y su inventario en el negocio ha mantenido buen número, sus condiciones económicas en la familia han mejorado.
texts.en:
Juan decided to get another loan to invest in his business, he will buy special bread to better stock his business, this will help him
have sufficient amounts of merchandise to service his customer during this end of year season, when demand goes up.
With the previous loan he strengthened his business, increased clientèle and his inventory has maintained at a good level, his family's financial condition has improved.

loans.use: to buy bread for sale.

loans.name: Bertha Alis

texts.es:
Bertha, vive con sus tres hijos de 15, 10 y 3 años de edad, todos dependen de ella, Bertha se dedica a la venta de tortillas y verduras, este negocio está situado en el mercado y lo realiza todos los días.
Bertha solicita un préstamo para la compra de maíz, tambien una plancha para hacer las pupusas y laminas, la cuales utilizara para el local, esto le ayudara para fortalecer el negocio y así tener mejor atención a los clientes.
Sus aspiraciones son, seguir adelante apoyando a sus hijos en los estudios para que puedan superarse, ya que solo ella vela por su bienestar.
texts.en:
Bertha lives with her three children, ages 15, 10, and 3, all of whom depend on her.  Bertha makes a living selling tortillas and vegetables.  Her business is in the market and she does it every day.

Bertha's requesting a loan to buy corn as well as a griddle to make pupusas and metal sheets to use in her food stall.  This will help her strengthen her business and better serve her customers.

Her goal is to get ahead by supporting her children in their studies so they can improve themselves because only she watches over their well-being.

loans.use: to buy corn, a griddle, and metal sheets

loans.name: Juan Francisco

texts.es:
Juan, se decidió por un nuevo préstamo, para surtir mas el negocio, comprando todos los materiales necesarios para la toma de fotografías y filme de videos, se comprara cintas, rollos, discos, Dvd, papel fotográfico, memorias y cubrirá otros gastos.
El manifiesta que su efecto con el préstamo anterior ha sido positivo, ya que ha continuado realizando su trabajo de una mejor manera, en su hogar la familia se mantiene con los ingresos, de su trabajo y ahorros ha comprado una motocicleta para transportarse a realizar los trabajos.
texts.en:
Juan decided to request a new loan so that he can restock his business with all the materials he needs for taking photographs and producing movie videos. He will buy video tapes, rolls of film, DVD discs, photograph paper, and memory cards. He will also pay for other expenses.

Juan said that his previous loan had a positive effect. He was able to continue his work and do a better job. His earnings allowed him to support his family. As a result of working and saving, Juan was able to buy a motorcycle so that he could travel to his work assignments.

loans.use: to buy video tapes, rolls of film, DVD discs, photograph paper, and memory cards.

loans.name: Carolina Lisset

texts.es:
Carolina, se decidió por un nuevo préstamo porque quiere surtir el negocio, para la temporada navideña, se comprara blusas para damas, ropa para niños, y ropa interior, esto le ayuda a mejorar la oferta para los clientes.

Ella manifiesta que trabajar con préstamos le ha permitido mejorar el negocio, dándole una condición más estable, en su familia sus hijos están asistiendo a la escuela.
texts.en:
Carolina decided to request a new loan because she wants to restock her business for the Christmas season. She will buy women’s blouses, children’s clothing, and undergarments. The loan will help to improve the inventory she offers to her customers.

Carolina says that working with the loans has allowed her to improve her business and stabilize its condition. With regard to her family, her children have been able to attend school.

loans.use: to buy women’s blouses, children’s clothing, and undergarments.

loans.name: Maria Anabel

texts.es: María Anabel de treinta años de edad vive junto a su compañero de vida y sus hijos en casa propia; ella se dedica a la crianza y venta de pollos además para complementar los gastos del hogar vende maíz y frijol de las cosechas obtenidas , tiene varios años de dedicarse al rubro y se ha hecho de mucha experiencia valiosa en el negocio que le deja muy buenas ganancias ,  es muy conocida en la zona y se ha hecho de mucha clientela porque todo lo que comercia es de calidad, lo vende a un buen  precio y el servicio es excelente, María es una mujer ejemplar, entregada a su trabajo siempre está a la expectativa de nuevas oportunidades que le permitan salir adelante pues sabe que así podrá alcanzar el éxito, En esta última temporada tuvo algunas perdidas y tiene el deseo de recuperarse pero necesita invertir en insumos por eso le solicita a INTEGRAL un crédito que le permita pollos por mayor. María Anabel tiene buenas referencias crediticias y tiene la certeza que podrá cancelar la deuda y a la vez confía que le dará a su familia una mejor calidad de vida.
texts.en:
María Anabel, 30 years old, lives with her life partner and their children in their own house.  She makes a living raising and selling chickens.  In addition, to supplement the household expenses, she sells corn and beans from the harvests she obtains.  She has worked for several years in this field and she has gained a lot of valuable experience in the business that allows her very good earnings.  She is very well-known in the area and has built a large clientele because all that she sells is of quality, she sells it all at a good price and the service is excellent.  María is an exemplary woman and committed to her work.  She is always on the lookout for new opportunities that will allow her to get ahead because she knows that in this way she can achieve success. 

In this last season she had some losses and she has the desire to recover but she needs to invest in supplies.  Therefore she is requesting a loan from Integral that will allow her to buy wholesale chickens.  María Anabel has good credit references and has the certainty that she will be able to pay off the debt.  At the same time she is confident that she will give her family a better quality of life.

loans.use: to buy wholesale chickens.

loans.name: Calixto Fortinato

texts.es: Calixto Fortinato vive junto a su compañera de vida y sus hijos, él se dedica al cultivo de maíz y maicillo y al mismo tiempo para complementar los gastos del hogar trabaja de jornal, tiene muchos años de dedicarse a la agricultura y se siente orgulloso porque ha logrado obtener mucha experiencia que le permitirá día con día mejorar sus cosechas, las tierras de cultivo son propias y están ubicadas en una zona muy agrícola, el recibe todo el apoyo de su familia ellos le ayudan a comerciar en todos los lugares aledaños ya tiene mucha clientela pues la gente lo prefiere por la calidad del producto por los buenos precios y por el buen servicio; Calixto es un hombre emprendedor, dedicado a su labor siempre esta con las ganas de superarse y llegar al éxito,  la temporada pasada tuvo pérdidas y no logró las ganancias esperadas, por eso para esta siembra quiere aumentar la producción y recuperarse pero necesita de capital que lo respalde porque todas sus compras son al contado, es así como decidió solicitarle a INTEGRAL un crédito que le permita comprar semilla de maíz, maicillo, fertilizante, herramientas, etc. Calixto fortinato es responsable con buenas referencias crediticias tiene la certeza que podrá cancelar el financiamiento y a la vez darle a su familia una mejor calidad de vida.
texts.en:
Calixto Fortinato lives with his life partner and his children. He works in the cultivation of corn and sorghum and at the same time, to complete the costs of the household, he works a daily wage. He has worked in agriculture for several years and he feels proud that he has been able to obtain so much experience that has allowed him day by day to improve his crops. The land of his crops is proprietary and they are located in an agricultural zone. He receives a lot of support from his family. They help him to trade in the bordering places and already he has great clientele. People prefer him for the quality of the product, for the good prices, and for the good service. 

Calixto is a hard worker dedicating his work to always getting ahead and be successful. The last period he had losses and did not make the income he expected. For this reason he wants to increase the production and recover this season.  However, he needs capital to back since all of his purchases are in cash. This is how he decided to request a loan from Integral for that allow him to buy corn seeds, sorghum, fertilizers, tools, etc. 

Calixto Fortinato is responsible, has good credit references, and the certainty that will allow him to cancel the financing and simultaneously give his family a better life.

loans.use: to buy corn seeds, sorghum, fertilizers, and tools

loans.name: Paradi De Dolval Group

texts.fr:
Yvonie est le coordinatrice de son groupe Paradi de Dolval. Elle est marié mais elle a 3 enfants. Elle habite dans la ville de Ouanaminthe d’Haiti où de l’éléctricité est rare et de l’eau est très limitée. Yvonie a dirigé son business pendant les 4 dernières années. 

Yvonie voudrait utiliser cet emprunt pour investir dans l’achat du cosmetiques et accessoires. Elle espère que cet emprunt l’aidera à agrandir son business. Des autres membres de Paradi de Dolval ont besoin d’un emprunt pour tels commerces comme vendre du charbon, du riz et du poisson. Yvonie dit que son défi principal est manque d’acheteur constant.
texts.en:
Yvonie is the coordinator of her group Paradi de Dolval. She is married and has three children. She lives in the city of Ouanaminthe, Haiti, where electricity is rare and water is very limited. Yvonie has been managing her business for the last four years. 

Yvonie would like to use this loan to invest in purchasing cosmetics and accessories. She hopes that this loan will help her to expand her business. Other members of Paradi de Dolval have need of a loan for such businesses as selling charcoal, rice, and fish. Yvonie says her main challenge is the lack of steady customers.

loans.use: to purchase cosmetics to sell

loans.name: Clara Luz

texts.es: Clara Luz de treinta y seis años de edad vive junto a su compañero de vida y sus hijos; Ella se dedica a la agricultura específicamente a la crianza y venta de pollos  además para complementar los gastos del hogar vende verduras y golosinas, tiene varios años de trabajar en el rubro  y ha ganado mucha experiencia que le permite obtener las mejores ganancias, su pequeña granja de pollos esta en su vivienda muy accesible para trabajar, comercia en todos los alrededores de la comunidad y ya tiene mucha clientela que la prefiere porque siempre posee lo que necesitan, con producto de calidad, a precios accesibles pero sobre todo con un excelente servicio; Clara es una mujer dedicada a su labor, muy humilde, enérgica y luchadora, todos los días se levanta dispuesta a lograr sus metas, se esfuerza al máximo pues sabe que así alcanzara el éxito que tanto desea, en la ultima temporada no pudo obtener las ganancias esperadas por eso quiere recuperarse y realizar una nueva inversión para ello le solicita a INTEGRAL un crédito que le permita comprar pollos y concentrado. Clara Luz tiene buenas referencias de pago y una moral intachable, agradece la ayuda que le brindan y al mismo tiempo asegura que podrá saldar la deuda, a la vez tiene fe que le dará a su familia una mejor calidad de vida como se la merecen.
texts.en: Clara Luz is thirty six years old. She lives with her life's companion and their children. She works in agriculture, specifically raising and selling chickens. She also sells vegetables and candies to cover the household expenses. She has been working in this area for several years and has gained much experience, which allows her to obtain better earnings. Her little chicken farm is at her home and very accessible for work. She sells in the areas surrounding her community and has a lot of customers who prefer her because she always has what they need with quality products and above all excellent service. Clara is a woman who is dedicated to her work and who is very humble, energetic and a fighter. Every day she gets up ready to achieve her goals. She works as hard as she can because she knows that that is how she will reach the success she so desires. Last season she wasn't able to get the profits she was expecting and that is why she wants to recuperate and make a new investment. That is why she is asking INTEGRAL for a loan that will allow her to buy chickens and concentrate. Clara Luz has good payment references and impeccable morals. She is grateful for the help offered and she is sure she can pay off the debt. She also has faith that it will give her family a better quality of life like they deserve.

loans.use: to buy chicken and concentrate.

loans.name: Anonymous Group
loans.use: To buy buttons, threads and a sewing machine for a sewing business

loans.name: Abel Danilo

texts.es: Abel Danilo de veintisiete años de edad vive junto a su compañera de vida y su hijo, él se dedica a la crianza y venta de pollos, tiene varios años de trabajar en la agricultura y eso le ha regalado valiosa experiencia que le permite obtener las mejores ganancias, el terreno de crianza esta ubicado en una zona apta para el trabajo y cercano a la localidad donde reside, comercia en todos los alrededores de la comunidad es muy conocido y se ha hecho de mucha clientela que lo prefiere por los buenos precios,  la calidad del producto y el excelente servicio; Abel es un hombre enérgico, dedicado a su labor, amable y muy honesto, siempre esta en toda la disposición de salir adelante y buscar un futuro mejor, en la temporada pasada aumentaron las ganancias y en esta siembra quiere aprovechar para realizar una nueva inversión por eso le solicita a INTEGRAL un crédito que le permita comprar pollos por mayor etc. Abel Danilo tiene buenas referencias de pago y es responsable asegura que podrá saldar la deuda y a la vez tiene fe que llevara a su hogar seguridad económica.
texts.en:
Abel Danilo is 27-years-old lives with is life partner and his son. He devotes himself to the upbringing and sale of chickens. He has been working several years in agriculture and this has given him a valuable experience that has allowed him to obtain the best earnings. The land used for breeding animals is located in a suitable zone for the work and near the locality where he resides. He trades in the surrounding community and is well known. He has gained a lot of clientele that prefer him for the good prices, the quality of the product, and excellent service. 

Abel is an energetic man, dedicated to his work, friendly and very honest. He is always in the mood to get ahead and look to a better future. In the last season his earnings increase and in this season he wants to take advantage of a new investment. For this reason he requests a loan from Integral that will allow him to buy wholesale chickens etc. 

Abel Danilo has good references of payments and is responsible. He assures that he will be able to pay the debt and simultaneously has faith that he will provide economic security to his home.

loans.use: to purchase wholesale chickens

loans.name: Lamentation De Geremy 4, 5 & 6 Group

texts.fr:
Modelline est la coordinatrice de son groupe Lamentation de Geremy 4, 5 & 6. Elle habite dans la région de Trou-du-Nord d’Haïti où de l’électricité est rare et de l’eau est très limitée. Elle a dirigé son commerce de restaurant pendant les 5 dernières années. Elle a 3 enfants.

Elle voudrait utiliser cet emprunt pour investir dans le Restaurant, elle a acheter de la nourriture pour votre restaurant. Des autres membres du groupe ont besoin d’un emprunt pour tels commerces comme vendre des produits alimentaires, cosmétiques, vêtements, chaussureset du charbon. Modeline dit que son défi principal est en mesure de vendre plus depuis la crise économique en Haïti ne reçoit pas beaucoup d'argent.
texts.en:
Modelline is the coordinator of her group Lamentation de Geremy 4, 5 & 6. She lives in the Trou-du-Nord region in Haiti, where electricity is rare and water is very limited. She has been managing her restaurant business for the last five years. She has three children 

She would like to use this loan to invest in the restaurant. She is going to purchase some food for her restaurant. Other members of the group have need of a loan for such businesses as selling grocery items, cosmetics, clothing, shoes, and charcoal. Modelline says her main challenge is to be in a position to sell more, since the economic crisis in Haiti does not bring in much money.

loans.use: to purchase food for her restaurant

loans.name: Anonymous Group
loans.use: To buy a sewing machine for her sewing business

loans.name: Roxana Elizabeth

texts.es:
Roxana, está casada, tiene un hijo de 5 años de edad, no recibe ayuda del exterior, ella se dedica a atender un chalet, el cual inicio por la necesidad de llevar un ingreso extra a su familia, este negocio tiene 6 años de existir. 
Solicita un préstamo para la compra de productos para surtir el chalet, gaseosas, churros, pan, entre otros productos que sean necesarios para mantener la variedad en el negocio, esto le permitirá mejorar sus ventas y sus ingresos.
Su objetivo es aumentar el negocio y comprar a futuro con su esposo un vehículo.
texts.en:
Roxana is married and has a five year old son.  She doesn’t get any outside help and has a café that she started out of the need to generate an extra family income.  She’s had this business for six years.

She is asking for this loan to buy products, such as soft drinks, churros, bread, and other things to stock her café and increase her sales and income.

Her objective is to expand her business and buy a vehicle for her husband in the future.

loans.use: to stock her store.

loans.name: Nasrin Group

texts.en: This group is called Nasrin and consists of four ladies who live in Sana'a, Yemen. Nasrin is a 23-year-old married woman who lives in Sana'a, Yemen and has one child. She owns a house in which she intends to build a kitchen, so she applied for a youth loan of 50,000 YER from AMB to buy construction supplies to use for building it. She hopes to buy furniture for her house to live with her family with comfortable standards.

loans.use: to buy construction supplies to use for building her kitchen.

loans.name: Jose Manuel

texts.es: José Manuel de treinta y dos años de edad vive junto a su compañera de vida y su hijo en casa propia , él se dedica al cultivo de maíz y frijol además trabaja de jornal para complementar los gastos del hogar, tiene varios años de trabajar en la agricultura y se ha hecho de mucha experiencia valiosa que le permite obtener siempre las mejores cosechas, el terreno esta en un lugar accesible apto para el cultivo y con suelo fértil, todo lo que produce lo comercia en todos los alrededores de la comunidad, ya tiene mucha clientela pues las personas saben que todo lo que vende es de primera calidad y a precios accesibles además se caracteriza por tener el mejor servicio; José es un hombre decidido, responsable y muy trabajador, tiene muchas metas para el futuro y con empeño y constancia piensa alcanzarlas, en la ultima temporada de siembra tuvo algunas perdidas y quiere recuperarse pero no posee de suficiente capital por eso le s solicita a INTEGRAL un crédito que le permita comprar semilla de maíz, frijol, herbicida, abono, herramienta, etc. José Manuel tiene buenas referencias de pago y se siente satisfecho con la colaboración, asegura poder saldar la deuda y a la vez ofrecerle a su familia una vida plena.
texts.en:
José Manuel, 32, lives with his partner and son in their own house.  He farms corn and beans and does day labor to help pay his household expenses.  He has been working in agriculture for many years and has a lot of valuable experience that allows him to always have good harvests.  His land is an accessible location for farming and has fertile soil.  He sells everything that he produces in and around his community, since he has a large clientele.  People know that whatever he sells is of the best quality and affordable.  Plus he offers excellent service.  

José is a dedicated, responsible and hardworking man.  He has many goals for the future and with success and effort, he hopes to achieve them.  Last season, he suffered some crop losses, and he wants to recuperate from them, but he does not have sufficient capital.  This is why he is asking Kiva partner INTEGRAL for a loan that will allow him to buy seed corn, beans, herbicide, fertilizer, tools, etc.  José Manuel has a good payment history and is happy to get this support.  He promises meet his payments and at the same time be able to offer his family a fulfilled life.

loans.use: to buy seed corn and beans, herbicide, fertilizer, and tools.

loans.name: Shahlar

texts.en:
Shahlar is a 35-year-old man, married with two children. Shahlar has bred cattle for the last 8 years. After several attempts to find job he gave up and decided to start his business. His wife is a school teacher and her salary is too low to cover family needs. Hence, Shahlar`s business is their main financial income.
Shahlar usually buys small calves, raises and fattens them for 5-6 months and then resells for a more profitable price at the livestock bazaar. His monthly income is 60 AZN and this business is only one source of financial income for his family. Beef is in very high demand in Azerbaijan and people use it in everyday dishes like pilau and dolma. Shahlar also keeps milking cows for personal use and for selling to neighbors.
He wants to expand his business and improve life conditions of his family. He applied for a 1200 AZN loan to purchase two cows and one milking cow. He promises to pay on time without any delays.

loans.use: to buy two cows for fattening and one milking cow.

loans.name: Ilham

texts.en:
Ilham is a 36-year-old man.  He is an IDP (Internally Displaced Person) who lives in the Bilasuvar IDP Settlement with his wife and two daughters. He is a farmer and has raised seasonal fruits and vegetables for the last 7 years. He chose this business because it is profitable and fresh crops are in high demand. People use fresh vegetables every day and consider them healthy.  Many national dishes are made of vegetable, like pilau and dolma. Fresh fruits are served on every table of Azerbaijan families and also make fresh punch.
Ilham sells his crop in the Bilasuvar central bazaar. His monthly income is 80 AZN. His wife actively helps him to raise the crops.
As his products are in high demand, Ilham wants to expand his business and produce more fruits and vegetables to cover the market demand. For this purpose he has applied for 100 AZN. He will buy new garden tools, seeds and fertilizers. This will be his second loan and he has a positive loan history.

loans.use: to buy new garden tools, seeds and fertilizers.

loans.name: Afila

texts.en:
Afila is a 38-year-old woman.  She is an IDP (Internally Displaced Person) who lives in the Bilasuvar IDP Settlement with her husband and two children. She is a farmer and has raised seasonal fruits and vegetables for the last 6 years. She chose this business because it is profitable and fresh crops are in high demand. People use fresh vegetables every day and consider them healthy.  Many national dishes are made of vegetables, like pilau and dolma. Fresh fruits are served on every table of Azerbaijan families and also make refreshing punch.
Afila sells her crops in the central bazaar. Her monthly income is 110 AZN. Her husband is a builder, but doesn’t have a permanent job and actively helps her to raise the crops.
As her products are in high demand, Afila wants to expand her business and produce more fruits and vegetables to cover the market demand. For this purpose she has applied for 1000 AZN. She will buy new garden tools, seeds and fertilizers.

loans.use: to buy new garden tools, seeds and fertilizers to produce more fruits and vegetables.

loans.name: Safha Jdida Group

texts.en: This group is called Safha Jdida and consists of five ladies who live in Sana`a, Yemen. Najah is 27 years old and married with 4 children. She is a hardworking woman who assists her husband to provide for her family’s daily expenses. Her husband has had a small grocery store for many years. She applied for a youth loan of 30000 YER from AMB to assist her husband in buying grocery items for resale.

loans.use: to assist her husband in buying grocery items for resale.

loans.name: Qurban

texts.en:
Qurban is 43 years old and married with two children. He is an IDP (Internally Displaced Person) and lives with his family in the Bilasuvar IDP Settlement. He breeds sheep for meat and fur purposes, and sells to local butchers. Qurban has more than 13 years of experience in this field, thanks to his father who taught him how to look after sheep. He receives 90 AZN financial support from the government monthly, but this is too low to cover his family needs.
Qurban usually buys lambs, raises and fattens them in 4-5 months and resells them for a more profitable price at the local livestock bazaar. His monthly income is 110 AZN. People use meat in everyday national dishes as pilau and dolma and always use yoghurt sauce. Mutton is considered very healthy and is also present in everyday life. Fur is very useful for blankets and bed mattresses made by local woman.
This is the only financial income for his family. Qurban applied for 1500 AZN to purchase 15 sheep and fodder.

loans.use: to buy 15 sheep and fodder.

loans.name: Nail

texts.en:
Nail is 24 years old, single and a very enthusiastic man. He is IDP and lives with his parents in the Bilasuvar IDP Settlement. He breeds sheep for meat and fur purposes that he sells to local butchers. Nail has 4 years of experience in this field, thanks to his father who taught him how to look after sheep and who helped him start the business. He receives 80 AZN financial support from the government monthly, but this is too low to expand business to respond to his customer`s demands.
Nail usually buys lambs, raises and fattens them for 4-5 months and resells them for a more profitable price at the local livestock bazaar. His monthly income is 120 AZN. People use meat in everyday national dishes as pilau and dolma and always use yoghurt sauce. Mutton is considered as very healthy and is also used in everyday life. Fur is very useful for blankets and bed mattresses that are made by local woman.
This is only financial income for his family. Nail applied for 1500 AZN to purchase 15 sheep and fodder.

loans.use: to buy 15 sheep and fodder.

loans.name: Qabil

texts.en:
Qabil is a 48-year-old man.  He is an IDP who lives in the Bilasuvar IDP Settlement with his wife and three children. He is a farmer and has raised seasonal fruits and vegetables for the last 10 years. He chose this business because it is profitable and fresh crops are in high demand. People use fresh vegetables every day and consider them healthy.  Many national dishes are made of vegetables, like pilau and dolma. Fresh fruits are served on every table in Azerbaijan and also make refreshing punch.
Qabil sells his crop in the Bilasuvar central bazaar. His monthly income is 100 AZN. His son actively helps him to raise crop.
As these products are in high demand, Qabil wants to expand his business and produce more fruits and vegetables to cover the market demand. To do this he applied for 1000 AZN. He will buy new garden tools, seeds and fertilizers. This will be his second loan and he has a positive client history.

loans.use: to buy new garden tools, seeds and fertilizers to grow more fruits and vegetables.

loans.name: Aziz

texts.en:
Aziz is 42 years old, and married with six children. He is IDP and lives with his family in the Bilasuvar IDP Settlement. He breeds cattle and sells milk and milk products, as well as cattle for meat purposes to local butchers. Aziz has more than 10 years of experience in this field, thanks to his father who taught him how to look after cattle. He receives 80 AZN financial support from the government monthly, but this is too low to cover the family needs.
Aziz usually buys small cattle, raises and fattens them for 5-6 months and resells them for a more profitable price at the local livestock bazaar. Milk and yoghurt he sells to the neighbors. Milk and meat selling brings in 100 AZN per month. Milk and yoghurt, as well as meat are very popular products in Azerbaijan. People use meat in everyday national dishes such as pilau and dolma and always use yoghurt sauce. Milk products are considered very healthy and are used in everyday life.
This is the only financial income in his family and not enough to cover basic needs of his beloved children. Jahangir applied for 1000 AZN to purchase one calf, one milking cow and fodder.

loans.use: to buy one calf, one milking cow and fodder.

loans.name: Kellen

texts.en:
Kellen, a married woman with four children, is a poultry farmer in a small trading centre along the Lyantonde-Masaka road on the high way to the western part of Uganda.  She dedicates seven days a week to her poultry since they need a lot of attention.  She would like to buy more chicks to feed and sell in a very short time.  She is confident that she will have many customers this festive season since there are so many people that travel from the city to the countryside. She will therefore make a lot of profits. 

Kellen hopes to expand her poultry farm to over one thousand hens if she gets enough income; the business has sustained her and the family through the years.  She is mostly challenged by limited capital and the high prices of poultry feed, not forgetting chicken disease.  She is grateful to Ugafode for support throughout the extension of her micro-business from loans.  She describes herself as hard working and shrewd.

loans.use: to buy chicks for her poultry farm.

loans.name: James

texts.en: James is a banana farmer from Rubindi, in Mbarara district. He is married with 8 children aged 1, 3, 5, 7, 9, 11, 13, 14; seven of them are in school. He also takes care of 6 dependents, the orphans of his late brother who died of AIDS; all of them are in school. He is a serious farmer and his family entirely depends on income from his banana sales to survive. He wants a loan of 1,500,000 UGX to buy fertilizer and manure to increase his production and create income for the survival of his family.

loans.use: to buy organic fertilizer.

loans.name: Flavia

texts.en:
Flavia is a single mother with 4 children, all of whom are in secondary school. After the death of her husband, she opted to start a small business for her family’s survival. It’s from this background that she started a tailoring business with one tailoring machine. Because of her hard work, the business has expanded to greater level; she currently has more than 5 sewing machines. She has also started training lessons for underprivileged children from the nearby area due to her great love for vulnerable children. Due to growing demand for her services and products she produces, she is faced with a challenge of competition and substandard machines that are making her business to grow less quickly than it otherwise could. Because of this, she is requesting a loan of 3,000,000 UGX to buy modern electronic machines to increase her market as well as income for the survival of her family. 

In the photo, you an see Flavia (right) and the UGAFODE staff with her sewing machines

loans.use: to buy electronic sewing machines.

loans.name: Joram

texts.en:
Joram is a hardworking man. He is 56 and happily married with 6 children, all of whom are in school. He spent all his life practicing agriculture, growing bananas and plantains, and poultry. He grew up without both parents, but because of his hard work he created to this business, a factor that has enabled him to have a family and even educate his children. 

He has requested a loan of 1,000,000 to buy feed for his birds (he started a poultry farm to supplement his income). The balance to be used to complete a house for his poultry. In the photo, you see Joram in his poultry house.

loans.use: to buy poultry feed.

loans.name: Amie's Group

texts.en:
Salone Microfinance Trust (SMT), a partner of Kiva.org that is based in Makeni, Northern Sierra Leone, is very pleased to present to you this group of teachers from Kenema, a city in Eastern Sierra Leone. These teachers have come to SMT to request a loan of 16,200,000.00 Leones from SMT/Kiva lenders. With this loan, they will be able to meet their immediate financial constraints. They can easily repay the loan, with the help of their monthly salaries. Their school’s bursar is directly responsible for doing the deductions and making the repayments on their behalf.

Jeneba is their featured leader. A native of Jormukafebu, in Eastern Sierra Leone, Jeneba is 50 year old. She is married to a teacher, and the couple has six children, three of whom are attending secondary and tertiary educational institutions. Jeneba has requested this loan in order to buy bags of cement for the construction of a family dwelling house.

loans.use: to buy bags of cement for the construction of a family dwelling house

loans.name: Kobla Group

texts.en:
Meet with members of the “Kobla” group from Kabala, a town in northern Sierra Leone. They are all local entrepreneurs who have come to SMT, a partner of Kiva, to apply for a loan of 2,000,000 for the entire group. With the help of this loan they will be able to expand their businesses, make more sales and consequently improve on their living conditions. 

Mohamed, who is pictured in the middle, is the leader of this group. The 46-year-old is married to a businesswoman and they have 5 children. Mohamed has been a businessman for 32 years now; he makes and sells shoes in wholesale to retailers. With his share of this loan, he is going to buy materials for shoe production in bulk, in order to be able to make a larger number of shoes for sale.

loans.use: to buy materials for shoe production in bulk in order to be able to make a larger number of shoes for sale

loans.name: Makieu Andrew's Group

texts.en:
Pictured here are teachers from a primary school in Blama, a small town in Eastern Sierra Leone. This group of teachers has come to SMT, a partner of Kiva.org based in Makeni, Northern Sierra Leone, to seek a loan of 13,500,000 Sierra Leonean Leones for the entire group. 

Each of these teachers has applied for this loan for a wide variety of reasons. Some would like to pay school fees for their children, others to invest in business, or to buy pieces of furniture, house building materials, etc. At the end of each month, they repay the loan using their monthly salaries. It is their school’s bursar who is directly responsible for doing the deductions and making the repayments on their behalf.

Sarah is the leader of this group of teachers. A native of Kalihun in Eastern Sierra Leone, the 32-year-old is married and has three children who are attending primary and secondary schools. Sarah has been a professional teacher for ten years now. She has requested this loan in order to pay school fees for her children.

loans.use: to pay school fees for her children.

loans.name: Lahai J.'s Group

texts.en:
Pictured above are a group of school teachers in the Eastern city of Kenema, Sierra Leone. This group of teachers has come to SMT, a partner of Kiva.org, to apply for a loan of 13,000,000 Leones in order to meet their immediate financial challenges. Some will use their share of the loan to pay school fees for their children, others will invest it in business, some will buy house building materials, etc. And at the end of each month, they repay the loan, using their monthly salaries. It is their school’s bursar who is directly responsible for doing the deductions and making the repayments on their behalf.

Bernadette is the featured leader of this group. A native of Daru, in Eastern Sierra Leone, the 61-year-old is a widow with five children. Bernadette is a school teacher and has been in the teaching profession for 40 years. She has requested this loan in order to pay school fees.

loans.use: to pay school fees for her children

loans.name: Avis

texts.en:
Avis is a hard-working young man. He is 22 years old and operates a mechanical workshop in Kakoba, a suburb of Mbarara municipality. 

Avis lost both parents at the age of 18, when he had just completed his senior four. After his parents' death, he could not continue with his studies due to lack of money for school fees. But because he is innovative, he started volunteering at his uncle’s workshop and later he learned how to repair radios, computers, and other household appliances to earn a living for himself and his brothers. 

Avis has requested a loan of 1,000,000 UGX to buy machines for his workshop to help him in his work and to upgrade the workshop to a better standard.

loans.use: To buy electronic appliances and tools to use for repair

loans.name: Hannah

texts.en:
Hannah is 24 years old and lives in Kakata Town. She is single and has two children, ages one and five. Only one child attends school. 

For the past four years, Hannah has been selling rice, soap, candy, etc. Sometimes she has fewer customers, but most of the time she makes a lot of profit. 

Hannah is requesting a loan to purchase more rice, soap, candy, etc. to expand her business. In the future, she hopes to expand her business into a big store.

loans.use: to purchase more rice, soap, candy, etc. to expand her business.

loans.name: Kenneth

texts.en:
Kenneth is 25 years, and married with two children.  He is an agriculturalist mainly dealing with coffee as his major source of income. 

He started the project in 2000,  when he bought two hectares for a coffee plantation. Kenneth has learned a lot from this project; he has managed to provide the basic necessities of life for his family. 

He wants a loan of 1,000,000 UGX  to purchase more coffee seeds for planting, fertilizer, and pesticides for his coffee plantation.  His dream is to own a large coffee processing factory in his region. 

Kenneth’s major challenges are inadequate coffee seeds, pests and seasonal changes which affect the growth of his coffee.

Kenneth is honest and hardworking.

loans.use: to buy coffee seedlings, fertilizer and pesticides for his coffee business.

loans.name: Adnan

texts.en:
Adnan is a 25-year-old single man who lives in Taiz, Yemen. He is a hard-working man. 

Adnan's educational background is secondary school. He works hard to provide all he needs. Adnan would like to buy home appliances, but he does not have sufficient money. So, he is requesting a youth loan of 100,000 YER from AMB to buy home appliances.

loans.use: to buy home appliances for his house.

loans.name: Sonia Gricelda

texts.es:
Sonia, vive con su esposo, tiene dos hijos quienes ya formaron sus propios hogares y viven separados de ella, Sonia se dedica a atender una tienda, este negocio surge como una fuente de ingresos para su hogar; el horario de atención es de 8:00am hasta las 6:00pm, lleva 6 años en el negocio.
Solicita un préstamo para la compra de gaseosas, boquitas, papel higiénico, jabón, y otros productos que sean necesarios, esto le ayudara a mejorar la condición del negocio y el servicio  a los clientes.
El objetivo de Sonia es mejorar la calidad de vida de su familia y sus ingresos.
texts.en: Sonia lives with her husband and has two children who are part of her family but now live on their own.  She has a small store that she began as a means for earning an income for the household and works from 8:00 am to 6:00 pm.  She’s been doing this for six years.  She is asking for a loan to buy soft drinks, snacks, bathroom tissue, and serve her customers.  Her objective is to improve her family’s quality of life and her income.

loans.use: to stock her store.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to stock her store.

loans.name: Maritza Elizabeth

texts.es:
Maritza, se ha decidido por continuar mejorando en el negocio, comprando vitaminas, productos naturales para fortalecer las defensas, cremas para la piel, esto le ayudara a tener mejor condición para salir a ofrecer a su clientela.

Ella manifiesta que el crédito anterior le ayudo a mejorar el negocio, manteniendo un buen numero de productos naturales para vender, en su familia la condición de vida ha estado bastante estable, teniendo lo más necesario.
texts.en:
Maritza has decided to continue improving her business, buying vitamins, natural products to strengthen the defenses, and skin creams. This will help her to have a better selection to bring out to offer her customers.

She says that the previous loan helped improve the business, maintaining a good number of natural products to sell. Her family life has been stable, having what is most needed.

loans.use: to buy natural products (vitamins, creams) to have a better selection to offer her customers

loans.name: Antonio Vidal

texts.es:
Antonio, tiene 29 años de edad, vive con su madre y cuatro hermanos, trabajan en el cultivo de granos básicos, con ello mantiene a su familia, él aprendió desde muy joven a realizar el trabajo agrícola, trabaja desde lunes a sábado de 6:00am a 12:00md.
Él solicita un préstamo porque se dispone a alquilar dos manzanas y media de terreno en los cuales realizara la siembra para las próximas temporadas, tendrá el dinero necesario para poder invertir y tener una mejor producción.
Su objetivo es mejorar sus condiciones económicas, ya que esto le permitirá tener una mejor condición de vida con su familia.
texts.en:
Antonio is 29 years old. He lives with his mother and four siblings. They work growing basic grains, which maintains the family. He learned from an early age to work in agriculture, working from Monday through Saturday from 6:00AM until noon.

He is asking for a loan because he has to rent 2-1/2 manzanas (about 4 to 5 acres of land) on which to plant for the upcoming season. He will have the necessary money to invest to have a better production.

His goal is to improve their financial situation, as this will permit him and his family to have a better quality of life.

loans.use: to rent about 4 to 5 acres of land to plant for the upcoming season

loans.name: Manantial De Vida 1, 2, 3 & 4 Group

texts.en:
Segunda is the coordinator of her group Manantial de Vida (Spring of Life) 1, 2, 3 & 4. Her group is located in Samana peninsula, an area of the Dominican Republic with a nascent tourism industry, where running water (none of which is potable) and electricity are unreliable. She makes her home here in a simple, rented structure with her four children, and is a single mother. 

Segunda is excited to be taking her tenth loan with Kiva partner Esperanza after having successfully repaid her previous loans and grown her business. She plans to use this loan to invest in her clothing business by purchasing jeans, blouses, skirts, sock, t-shirt, etc. She will use the profits to save and to start building her house. Segunda's dreams are to see her children become professional and to live with her family in a safe and well-built home. She thanks you all for your support.

loans.use: to buy clothes to sell.

loans.name: Pensando En El Futuro Group

texts.en:
Francisca is one of the members of the Grupo Pensando en el Futuro (Thinking about the Future), located in the city of Samana. This group is composed of fifteen micro-entrepreneurs who sell clothes, shoes, cosmetics, and fruits, and who also provide services including a beauty salon, etc.

Francisca is a businesswoman who lives with her three children. She tells us that her greatest challenge is to help her children to grow and become professional. She is very excited to receive her first loan with Kiva partner Esperanza Internacional, which she will invest in her business inventory by buying different household cleaning product boxes. She has had her business for about 4 years. She started it with some savings she had. Her dream is to have a successful business and a comfortable house.

loans.use: to buy household cleaning products for her business.

loans.name: Jose Alfredo

texts.es:
José, se decidió por un nuevo préstamo porque necesita arrendar dos manzanas de terreno para poder cultivar en el próximo año, con esto estará seguro para continuar realizando la labor de agricultura.

Él considera que trabajar con préstamos le ha permitido, tener más capacidad para realizar los cultivos, la producción ha sido abundante, en su familia todos se encuentran bien, su capacidad económica ha aumentado para cubrir lo necesario en el hogar.
texts.en:
José decided to seek a new loan because he needs to rent two manzanas (about 3.5 acres) of land to be able to farm in the next year. With this, he will be certain to continue to do agricultural work.

He feels that working with loans has permitted him to have a greater capacity for growing crops. The production has been abundant. Everyone in his family is well. His economic capacity has increased to cover the necessities of his household.

loans.use: to rent two manzanas (about 3.5 acres) of land

loans.name: Hersan  Jose

texts.es:
Hersan, 27 años de edad, originaria de Managua, casado, padre de 2 hijos entre las edades de 5 y 1 años respectivamente, de oficio comerciante. Inicio su actividad laboral motivado por su papa quien es mecánico automotriz, luego decidió estudiar cursos para ampliar sus conocimientos y asi poder administrar su propio negocio, de esta manera hoy en día ha ido haciéndole mejoras al local, además de este  negocio  tiene otro, los fines de semana se dedica  a  la venta de ropa que la vende en Ticuantepe, el cual le genera muchos ingresos.
Hersan esta solicitando el préstamo para comprar accesorios eléctrico como, luces para vehículo, grasas, lija, alambre para vehículos, etc. Toda la materia prima que necesita para su taller de mecánico, ya que el estima que este crédito le ayudara a crecer en su negocio, porque asi  podrá invertir en productos mas solicitado por el cliente, sus planes futuros es ampliar el negocio, su meta próxima es poder ir a legalizar su negocio en la Alcaldía, para tener mejores oportunidades de ventas.
texts.en:
Hersan, 27, was born in Managua and is married and has two children, ages 5 and 1. He runs a business which is inspired by his father's work as an auto mechanic. Hersan took training courses and is now managing his business and renovating his facilities. On weekends, he has another business selling clothing in Ticuantepe that generates substantial income.

Hersan is applying for a loan to buy auto accessories and parts like lights, grease, sandpaper, wire, and all the supplies he needs for his repair shop. He believes this loan will help him grow his business and invest in products his customers want. His plan is to grow the business, and his goal is to register it with the municipality to have better sales opportunities.

loans.use: to buy auto accessories and parts like lights, grease, sandpaper, wire, and more.

loans.name: Erika Ismenia

texts.es:
Erika, se decidió por un nuevo préstamo, para poder invertir en la recolección de la cosecha de granos básicos, con el dinero pagara mozos, para que saquen la cosecha y tambien alquilara una maquina desgranadora para preparar el maíz.

Con el préstamo anterior tuvo un efecto positivo que le ayudo para generar ingresos de la siembra, con esto ha podido comprar alimentación y herramientas, en sus condiciones económicas tiene una mayor capacidad para seguir trabajando.
texts.en:
Erika decided to take a new loan in order to be able to invest in the harvest of basic grains. With the money she will pay workers to harvest the crop and also rent a shelling machine to prepare the corn. 

With the previous loan she had a positive effect that helped her to generate income from planting. With this money she has been able to buy food and tools. In her economic conditions she has a greater capacity to keep working.

loans.use: to pay workers, and to rent a sheller machine.

loans.name: Sagrario Del Rosario

texts.es:
Sagrario, se decidió por solicitar un nuevo crédito, para la temporada de fiestas de fin de año, con lo que logra realizar mejores ventas porque la demanda aumenta, se comprara cocos, leche, melocotón.

Ella considera que con los prestamos ha mejorado su estabilidad económica, ha mejorado su negocio y las ventas, en este tiempo ella ha comprado carretones para la venta de sorbetes, esta prosperando económicamente, también comenta que logro comprarse en este periodo un vehículo.
texts.en: Sagrario decided to apply for a new loan for the year-end holiday season. By buying coconuts, milk, and peaches now, she can increase her sales because demand is high. She believes her loans have improved her financial situation and increased her sales. She has purchased carts to sell sherbert and is prospering. She also says she was able to buy a vehicle.

loans.use: to buy coconuts, milk, and peaches.

loans.name: Jose Reynaldo

texts.es:
José, se decidió por un nuevo préstamo porque necesita invertir en la recolección de la cosecha de granos básicos, ya que tiene que pagar mano de obra y una maquina desgranadora de maíz, esto le ayudara a tener la cosecha lista para el consumo.
El efecto que tuvo con el préstamo anterior fue un aumento en la productividad con lo que ha podido vender y generar ingresos que le ayudan a la alimentación de la familia, gracias a los créditos  está mejorando sus condiciones económicas.
texts.en:
José decided to seek a new loan because he needs to invest in collecting his harvest of basic foods, since he has to pay for labor and a corn shelling machine. This will help him to have his harvest ready for consumption.

The result that he had from the previous loan was an increase in productivity, with which he was able to make sales and generate income that helped him to feed his family. Thanks to the loans, he is improving his economic condition.

loans.use: to pay for labor and a corn shelling machine.

loans.name: Anonymous Group
loans.use: to buy rice, beans, flour, canned food, etc., to sell.

loans.name: Julia Maria

texts.es:
Julia con 37 años de edad, originaria de Granada, madre de 3 hijos entre las edades de 10, 17 y 19 años respectivamente, de oficio comerciante. Ella inicio su actividad laboral  lavando y planchando  a domicilio,  al igual que muchas  otras personas  buscan como ganarse la vida  y salir adelante con su familia, trabajan en el comercio informal. Luego ella decidí emprender otro negocio como es la venta de frutas y verduras, de forma ambulante, ella cuenta con el apoyo de sus hijos, sus expectativas es incrementar sus ventas para comprar por mayor sus verduras.
Julia solicita el financiamiento para comprar  plátanos, cebolla, papa, naranja, limón y melón etc. Ya que ella estima que este crédito le ayudara a comprar más producto que aun no tiene en existencias, sus  planes  futuro es mejorar la infraestructura del negocio para salir a vender mas variedad de frutas en todo el mercado, de esta manera ella lograría  incrementar sus ventas y así obtener mejores ganancias y lograr alcanzar una mejor calidad de vida para sus hijos.
texts.en:
Julia, who is a native of Granada, is the mother of three children, ages 10, 17, and 19. She is a merchant. She began her working life washing and ironing at home. Like many other people seeking to earn a living and get ahead with their families, she worked in informal commerce. Then she decided to begin another business, selling fruits and vegetables as a street vendor. She has the support of her children. Her goal is to increase her sales so that she can buy her vegetables wholesale.

Julia is applying for a loan to buy bananas, onions, potatoes, oranges, lemons, melons, etc. Since she estimates that this loan will help her to buy more products that she doesn't yet have in stock, her future plan is to improve the infrastructure of her business so that she can go out to sell a greater variety of fruits all over the market. In this way she would manage to increase her sales and thus obtain better earnings and achieve a better quality of life for her children.

loans.use: to buy bananas, onions, potatoes, oranges, lemons, melons, etc. to sell

loans.name: Reina Guadalupe

texts.es:
Reina, se dedica a la venta de pupusas, no tiene hijos que dependan de ella, solo vive con su esposo quien también trabaja, este trabajo lo inicio como una fuente de ingresos para cubrir sus gastos, inicia su labor todos los días de 8.00am a 5:00pm, además de las pupusas también vende tostadas y refrescos,
Ella solicita un préstamo para la compra de maíz, quesillo, plátanos, condimentos, que son necesarios para realizar la preparación de la venta, este préstamo le ayudara a realizar la compra de productos para mejorar las ventas.
La aspiración de ella es mejorar la calidad de vida, mantener su negocio estable para contar con los ingresos necesarios.
texts.en: Reina sells pupusas, filled tortillas, and has no dependent children. She lives with her husband, who also works. She started her business to have an income source to pay expenses, and she works every day from 8.00am until 5:00pm. She also sells tacos and sodas. She is applying for a loan to buy corn, soft cheese, plantains, and the spices needed to prepare her foods. The loan will allow her to buy ingredients to increase sales. Her dream is to improve her quality of life and keep her business going because her income depends on it.

loans.use: to buy corn, soft cheese, plantains, and spices.

loans.name: Anonymous Group
loans.use: to buy clothes to sell.

loans.name: Pedro Juan

texts.es:
Pedro, es electricista, vive con su esposa y los hijos de 3 y 10 años de edad en aprendió este oficio su familia y trabaja independientemente, no tiene horario exacto hasta el momento no ha tenído ninguna dificultad para realizar su trabajo desde hace 15 años.

Él solicita un préstamo para la compra de materiales eléctricos como cables, tenazas, cinturón, y otros que son indispensables para realizar su trabajo con él cuidado adecuado, esto le ayudará a tener todo el equipo propio.

Los sueños de él es llegar a obtener contratos en el área de electricidad ya que esto le permitirá tener una mejor estabilidad económica para ayudar a su familia
texts.en:
Pedro is an electrician. He lives with his wife and his children, ages 3 and 10. He learned this trade from his family and works independently. He does not have an exact schedule, but for 15 years and up to now he has not had any difficulty doing his work.

He is applying for a loan to buy electrical materials such as wires, pliers, a belt, and other items that are indispensable for doing his work. With suitable care, this will help him to have all his own equipment.

His dream is to obtain contracts for electrical work, since this would allow him to have more stable income to help his family.

loans.use: to buy wires, pliers, and a belt

loans.name: Las Ovejitas 1 Group

texts.en:
Jesucita is the coordinator of her group, Las Ovejitas (The little lambs) group 1a.
