texts.es: Ayda es una cliente exitosa que se tiene en su casa una pulpería desde hace 12 años, es madre soltera con cuatro hijos de 19, 27, 25,20 y 19años respectivamente, uno de sus hijos le ayuda en la administración del negocio, el crédito lo invertirá en la compra de granos básicos como arroz, frijoles, azúcar, jabón de lavar, jabón de baño, productos lácteos como crema, leche en bolsa, sopas magi etc.
texts.en: Ayuda is an existing client who's had a store in her home for 12 years. She's a single mom with 4 children aged 19, 27, 25, and 20 years old. One of her sons helps her run the business. She will invest the loan into the purchase of basic goods like rice, beans, sugar, washing soap, bath soap, and dairy products like cream, bags of milk, soups, Magi, etc.

loans.use: to buy rice, beans, oil, beef, chicken, washing soap, and bath soap.

loans.name: José Saúl

texts.es:
José tiene 41 años de edad, esta acompañado y tiene un hijo. Él toda su vida a trabajado en el cultivo de de granos básicos como fríjol, maíz y maicillo, fueron su abuelos y padres quienes le enseñaron. Con el paso del tiempo se caso y formo su propia familia; ellos son por los que José trabaja muy duro cada día. Desde hace 12 años se traslada a la capital del país a vender sorbetes naturales de manera ambulante por las calles y parques de la capital,  cada 15 días José viaja a la comunidad donde esta su familia a verlos y ha trabajar en el cultivo de maíz y fríjol que posee. 


El préstamo que esta solicitando a Fundación Campo, es para comprar un frrizer, tubos, un carretón y un juego de llantas, para elaborar él los sorbetes y venderlos en la comunidad donde reside su familia y ya no viajar a venderlos a la capital. Pues esta lejos de su familia por mucho tiempo y será dueño de su negocio; por que actualmente es empleado. Espera obtener mejores ingresos para su familia y tener más tiempo para ellos.
texts.en:
José is 41 years old, has a wife, and has one son.  He has worked his whole life planting basic grains like beans, corn and sorghum.  He was taught by his grandparents and parents.  With the passing of time he married and formed his own family.  José works very hard for his family each day.  He moved to the capital of his country 12 years ago in order to sell natural fruit drinks as a walking vendor in the streets and parks of the capital.  Every two weeks José travels to the community where his family lives to see them and to work in the corn and bean fields that they own.  

The loan that he is requesting from Kiva partner Fundación Campo is for purchasing a freezer, flatbed trailer, and tires in order to make and sell the fruit drinks in the community where his family lives and not have to travel anymore to sell them in the capital.  He is far from his family much of the time and this would make him the owner of his own business -- currently he is an employee for someone else.  He hopes to obtain better income for his family and to have more time with them.

loans.use: to buy a freezer, flatbed trailer, and tires in order to make and sell frozen fruit drinks

loans.name: Santa Julia

texts.es: Santa Julia tiene 33 años de edad madre soltera con tres hijos de 15,12y 13 años de edad, tiene una pulpería en su casa desde hace 4 años, el crédito lo invertirá en la compra de granos básicos como arroz, frijoles, azúcar, aceite, pampers, carne de pollo, carne de res, queso, crema atún etc.
texts.en:
Santa Julia is a 33-year-old single mother of three children who are 15, 13, and 12 years old. She has had a small grocery store in her house for four years. 

Santa Julia will invest this loan in the purchase of basic staples like rice, beans, sugar, oil, diapers, chicken, beef, cheese, cream, tuna, etc.

loans.use: to purchase staples like rice, beans, sugar, oil, diapers, chicken, beef, cheese, and tuna.

loans.name: Manuela  Lisseth

texts.es: Manuela es una microempresaria de éxito con 46 años de edad, madre soltera con dos hijos mayores de 26, 20 años de edad,  hace dos años vende ropa usada en su domicilio. El propósito del crédito es en adquirir paca de ropa usada de buena calidad.
texts.en: Manuela is 46 years old and a successful small businesswoman. She is a single mother of two adult children who are 26 and 20 years old. She has been selling used clothing out of her home for two years. The purpose of the loan is to acquire bales of good-quality used clothing.

loans.use: to purchase bales of used clothing.

loans.name: Ideal Group

texts.es: Miembros del grupo formado por tres socias microempresarias de éxitos una de ellas es Thania mujer de 23 años de edad soltera se dedica a elaborar trajes típicos en su domicilio que los vende en el mercado de Masaya, lleva con la institución 7 años consecutivos, el crédito lo invertirá en materia prima como telas, dacron, conos de hilo, hilos de bordados, encajes adornos etc. Thelma vende frutas y verduras y Irene elabora trajes típicos.
texts.en: This group is composed of three successful small business owners, one of whom is Tania. She is a woman of 23 years who makes traditional clothes in her home that she sells in the market in Masaya. She has been with the institution for 7 consecutive years. The loan will be used to invest in raw materials such as fabric, Dacron [quilt batting], cones of thread, embroidery thread, lace trimming, etc. Thelma sells fruits and vegetables and Irene makes traditional clothing.

loans.use: purchase fabric, Dacron [quilt batting], cones of thread, embroidery thread, lace trimming, etc

loans.name: Jehova Nice Group

texts.es: Grupo Solidario formado por cinco miembros microempresarios una de ellas es Angela quien tiene una pulpería desde hace 20 años en su domicilio, tiene 57 años y con un hijo mayor, el crédito lo invertirá en la compra de granos básicos como arroz, frijoles, azúcar, aceite, papel higiénico, carne de res, carne de pollo, etc. Esperanza tiene una pulpería en su domicilio, Nora Amalia vende pollos en piezas desde hace 20 años, María Magdalena hace y vende tortilla, pinolillo desde hace 15 años, Rosa vende joyas de plata desde hace 5 años.
texts.en:
This is a group that is made up of five members, who are all small-business owners. One of them is Angela, who has been running a small grocery store out of her home for the past 20 years. She is 57 years old and has one adult child. She will use the loan to buy basic grains such as rice, beans, sugar, oil, toilet paper, beef, chicken meat, etc.

Esperanza has a small grocery store that she runs out of her home; Nora Amalia has been selling chicken meat for the past 20 years; María Magdalena has been making and selling tortillas and cornmeal for the past 15 years; and Rosa has been selling silver jewelry for the past 5 years.

loans.use: to buy grains such as rice, beans, sugar, oil, toilet paper, beef, and chicken meat in pieces.

loans.name: Patricio Group

texts.es: Grupo formado por tres socios emprendedores una de ellas es Marisol trabaja en artesanía en palma hace chischil, canastas y trenzas  de palma desde hace 4 años, es madre casada con dos hijos quienes les ayudan en su negocio, el crédito lo invertirá en la compra de materia prima como es la palma, Irma vende queso, huevo desde hace 6 años y José Domingo vende artesanía echa de palma.
texts.en:
This group is formed by three entrepreneur partners. One of them is Marisol, who works doing craftworks with palm. She makes rattles, baskets and palm braids for four years. She is married and is a mother of two children who help her in the business.

The loan will be invested in the purchase of raw materials such as palm.

Irma sells cheese and eggs for six years and José Domingo sells craftworks made of palm.

loans.use: to purchase raw materials such as palm.

loans.name: La Finca Group

texts.es: Grupo formado por tres socio todos originarios de Masaya una de ellas es Concepción tiene 50 años y se dedica a vender carne de res desde hace 30 años, es casada y tiene 6 hijos todos mayores de edad, el crédito lo invertirá en la compra de carne de res, Heidi de los Angeles vende ropa en el mercado  de la localidad y Cristian vende carne de res en su domicilio.
texts.en: This group is comprised of three members from Masaya.  One of them, Concepción, is 50 years old and has been selling beef for 30 years.  She is married and has six adult children.  She will use the loan to buy beef.  Heidi de los Angeles sells clothing at the local market and Cristian runs a beef home delivery service.

loans.use: To buy beef.

loans.name: Betania Group

texts.es: Grupo formado por tres socias microempresarias de éxitos una de ellas es Nancy Carolina  desde hace dos años vende zapatos es soltera y los comercializa por encargo, el crédito lo invertirá en la compra de zapatos, María tiene un taller de carpintería donde fabrica muebles de mimbres y de material ratán tiene cinco años de tener su negocio y  Rosmery   vende cosmético de la Avon por encargo y al crédito.
texts.en: This group is comprised of three successful micro-entrepreneurs, one of which is Nancy Carolina who has been selling shoes for two years.  She is single and sells on an order basis.  She will use the loan to buy shoes.  María has a carpentry business and makes wicker and rattan furniture.  She has been in business for five years.  Rosmery sells Avon cosmetics on a credit basis.

loans.use: To buy shoes.

loans.name: Peniel Group

texts.es: Grupo formado por tres socias emprendedoras una de ellas es Reina quien tiene una pulpería en su domicilio desde hace dos años, es una mujer casada, luchadora quien tiene dos hijos menores, quienes le ayudan a cuidar y atender el negocio. El crédito lo invertirá en la compra de granos básicos como arroz, frijoles, azúcar, aceite, papel higiénico etc. Silvia María vende pan ambulante desde hace 15 años en las calles de Masaya y Kenia desde hace dos años vende ropa y queso.
texts.en: This group is comprised of three women entrepreneurs, one of whom is Reina who has been running a grocery store out of her home for two years.  She is married and works hard for her two minor children who help her take care of the store and attend to the public.  She will use the loan to buy basic staples such as rice, beans, sugar, oil, toilet tissue, etc.  Silvia María has worked as a street vendor for 15 years in the streets of Masaya.  Kenia has been selling clothing and cheese for two years.

loans.use: To buy basic staples such as rice, beans, sugar, oil, toilet tissue, etc.

loans.name: Alvaro De Jesus' Group

texts.es: Grupo Solidario formado por tres socios uno de ellos es Alvaro de Jesús desde hace 10 años vende trigos, maíz, frijoles. EL socio se dedica a la agricultura en la siembra de granos, este crédito lo invertirá en la compra de insumos para la siembra como semillas mejorada, insecticidas, fungicidas, preparación de terrenos, abono etc. Paula vende pollo a domicilio y Rosibel vende frutas y verduras en su domicilio.
texts.en: The communal bank Grupo Solidario is comprised of three members, one of whom is Alvaro de Jesús who has been selling wheat, corn and beans for ten years.  He is a farmer and grows grain for a living.  He will use the loan to buy supplies such as quality seeds, insecticides, and fungicides, and prepare the farmland with fertilizer, etc.  Paula sells chicken and Rosibel has a fruit and vegetable home delivery service.

loans.use: To buy supplies such as quality seeds, insecticides, and fungicides, and to prepare the farmland.

loans.name: Los Hernandez Group

texts.es: Grupo formado por cuatros socios emprendedores una de ellas es Darling tiene 33 años de edad y vende ropa usada desde hace 5 años. El crédito lo solicitara para la compra de ropa de paca usada, Mayra vende también ropa usada y julia Mercedes vende ropa usada.
texts.en: This group has three entrepreneurial members.  One of them is 33-year-old Darling who has been selling used clothing for five years.  She is requesting the loan to buy bundles of used clothing.  Mayra and Julia Mercedes also sell used clothing.

loans.use: to buy bundles of used clothing

loans.name: Emiliana

texts.es: Microempresaria de éxitos así se le denomina a Emiliana quien tiene 47 años, acompañada quien dice que hace 12 años se dedica a vender prendas de plata y bisuterías, su negocio lo tiene ubicado en el mercado de Granada. Con la institución tiene tres años consecutivos  en los préstamos, el crédito lo invertirá en la compra de prendas de plata como anillos, aretes, pulseras, cadenas, dijes etc.
texts.en: 47-year-old Emiliana lives with her partner and can be described as a successful micro-businesswoman.  She says that she has been selling silver jewelry and costume jewelry for 12 years.  Her business is located in Granada market.  She has been taking out loans with the institution for three consecutive years and will invest her current loan in buying silver jewelry such as rings, earrings, bracelets, chains, charms, etc.

loans.use: to buy gold and silver jewelry such as rings, earrings, bracelets, chains, charms, etc.

loans.name: Merali

texts.es: Mareli es una microempresaria tiene 33 años de edad es originaria de Catarina es casada y tiene cinco hijos menores quienes le ayudan a cuidar el negocio, su negocio es la venta de artesanía y fritanga en su domicilio, el crédito lo invertirá en la compra de materia prima para la fritanga como arroz, frijoles, azúcar, aceite, carne de res, carne de pollo, verduras, perecederos entre otros.
texts.en:
Mareli is a 33 year old small businesswoman.  She is from Catarina, and she is married.  She has five minor children, and they help her take care of the business.  She sells handicrafts and fried food at her house.

She will use the loan to buy raw material for the fried food business.  She will buy things like rice, beans, sugar, cooking oil, beef, chicken, vegetables, and perishables, among others.

loans.use: to buy rice, beans, sugar, cooking oil, beef, chicken, vegetables, and perishables, among others.

loans.name: Sokleap

texts.en:
Shown in the picture is a 26-year-old married woman named Sokleap. She and her family reside in a rural area of the Prey Chhor district located in Kampong Cham province in Cambodia. Sokleap is blessed with a son who is still dependent on her and too young for school.

To offer a decent life to her family, she has a business farming rice. To add more income to the family, Sokleap’s husband plants cassava and works for others as a paid worker. Together, this couple is able to earn around 9 USD per day and save approximately 5 USD after deducting the daily expenses. 

Sokleap is a first-time borrower with VisionFund, Kiva’s partner. She is now requesting a 1,100 USD loan to purchase more plots of farmland. This hardworking woman, Sokleap, expects that, after receiving the requested loan, she can expand her business, earning greater profit and better supporting her beloved family. In the future, she also hopes that she can send her children to good schools.

loans.use: to purchase more plots of farmland

location.town: Kampong Cham province, Prey Chhor district
